ygData.subject: Re: [EQ_women] chat channel
ygData.messageBody:
Salutations Ainthara!

<< Is there an in-game chat channel for us? If so,
what is it? If not, could we make one? I think it
would be fun to chat with you all sometimes while we
play (battlespam allowing lol) >>

I'm not aware of one other than the standard means of
communicating in game.

Another problem I think is that some of us dont play
that actively anymore, and many that do are spread out
over a nubmer of servers.

I've mentioned it before but I'll say it again that I
would love to get together with some people here in
game and chat, or maybe group a bit.

I've done a little gaming with nwn and although the
engine does not run smoothly on my computer one thing
I've liked is that I have a regular group that I often
get together with on Friday evenings for a session.

I've kind of thought that something similar here would
be cool. If anyone had characters that would already
match up that would be great, or I would be happy to
create a new toon on whatever server was agreeable and
try to set up a regular, or semi regular time that we
could get together and group.

Right now I've got a lvl 33 Wood Elf Ranger and a lvl
1 Iksar Shaman on Xygony, and a lvl 2 Half Elf Bard on
Chazic Thule (sp), but I'm game for whatever if anyone
else has any interest.

Hugs,
Bran
